refnamediv.refpurpose: Sets the material for all regions found in the given group.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: The remat sets the material for all regions found under the given assembly to the inputted value. If a region is given, it will set the material for just that region.

example.title: Set the material to 5.
example.para: All regions under example.c will have their material code reset to 5.

refsection.title: BUG REPORTS
